title: Supporting Open Internet Research - IETF 105 - Global Access to the Internet for All (GAIA)
description: M-Lab Director, Lai Yi Ohlsen, and Community Lead, Chris Ritzo, presented remotely to the GAIA working group at IETF 105. The talk, "Supporting Open Internet Research", provided an introduction to M-Lab tools and data, and how our platform is currently used by researchers.
